name: SelectPopup
description:
A container for the select items.
Renders a `<div>` element.

className.type: string | ((state: { side, align, open, transitionStatus }) => string)
className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.type: React.ReactElement | ((props: unknown, state: { side, align, open, transitionStatus }) => React.ReactElement)
render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-open.description: Present when the select is open.

data-closed.description: Present when the select is closed.

data-side.description: Indicates which side the select is positioned relative to the trigger.

data-starting-style.description: Present when the select is animating in.

data-ending-style.description: Present when the select is animating out.
